mapper.sql: id, param_code AS paramCode, param_val_variable AS paramValVariable,model_id AS modelId, create_by AS createBy, create_date AS createDate, update_by AS updateBy, update_date AS updateDate, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: SELECT v.* from t_param_value_variable v WHERE v.param_code=#{0} and del_flag=0
